main event: Multiple UFO sightings reported across various locations on February 27, 1962.
interesting points: Sightings were reported by military personnel and civilian observers in locations such as Maskwa (Canada), Ocean Station Delta (Atlantic), Iceland, Gatesville (Texas), Winnemucca (Nevada), Rolesville (North Carolina), Miami (Florida), the Pacific Ocean, Louisana, Baldwinsville (Massachusetts), Alwal North (South Africa), the Pacific Ocean, Luzon (Philippines), San Juan (Puerto Rico), St. Croix (West Indies), Bermuda, and Titusville (Florida).
Some of the reported objects were described as bright, round UFOs flying low over the horizon.

Additional sightings were reported in Los Angeles (California), New Zealand, Caracas (Venezuela), Bessemer (Alabama), northern Ohio, and Sheffield (England), but were not officially classified as cases.
The report indicates that a high number of UFO sightings were experienced during this time period across multiple locations.
The sightings involved a variety of observers, including military personnel and civilian witnesses.
location: Multiple locations across North America, the Atlantic Ocean, South America, and Europe
